price: Woi nom (a yεbobͻͻ wͻn din yi) yε nnipa a wͻ’atwa mu kͻ, deε wͻ’nyaeε no yε wͻn dea, εna deε monso monyaeε yε monso modea. Na yemmisa mo deε na wͻ’yε no ho asεm.
arabic: تِلۡكَ أُمَّةٞ قَدۡ خَلَتۡۖ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتۡ وَلَكُم مَّا كَسَبۡتُمۡۖ وَلَا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: til'ka ummatun qad khalat lahā mā kasabat walakum mā kasabtum walā tus'alūna ʿammā kānū yaʿmalūna
